SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
JsonReader
The JsonReader class is responsible for loading and parsing JSON files containing theme data for quizzes.
PointsCounter
The PointsCounter class manages the scoring system for the quiz application.
Question
The Question class represents a single question in the quiz, including its text, type (text input, single choice, or multiple choice), and a list of correct and wrong answers.
Quiz
The Quiz class facilitates a quiz application designed to help users prepare for exams by practicing various topics.
Stopwatch
A Stopwatch class that implements a simple stopwatch functionality which can either count up from 0 or count down from a specified limit of seconds.
Theme
The Theme class represents a theme or topic for the quiz, containing a collection of questions related to the theme.
